content:
. What happens if a candidate placed by OODA Team doesn't work out?

At OODA Team, we strive to ensure a perfect match between candidates and organizations. However, if a candidate doesn't work out within a specified period, our team will work closely with your organization to understand the reasons and initiate a new search for a suitable replacement at no additional cost, depending on the terms of our agreement.

1. How can I stay updated on job opportunities with OODA Team?

To stay updated on job opportunities with OODA Team, visit our website and explore the current job listings. You can also follow us on our social media channels for the latest updates on job openings and industry news.

1. Does OODA Team provide support with visa and relocation processes for international hires?

While OODA Team primarily focuses on talent identification and recruitment, we can provide guidance and support for visa and relocation processes for international hires. Our team can connect organizations with expert partners to assist with these matters and ensure a smooth transition for both the candidate and the employer.

1. How can I provide feedback on my experience with OODA Team?

Your feedback is invaluable to us, as it helps us continuously improve our services. You can provide feedback on your experience with OODA Team by contacting us through our website, phone, or email. We appreciate your input and will use it to enhance our recruitment process and client experience.

1. How is OODA Team compensated for its services?

Our compensation structure is typically based on a percentage of the candidate's first-year salary, which is agreed upon with the client before the search begins. This ensures transparency and aligns
